alert.note: Alert for Far Northwest Highlands; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 7:17PM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Far Northwest Highlands and West Central Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Far Northwest Highlands; West Central Mountains
